name: Glass Bottle
description: This is a transparent glass bottle suitable for storing liquids.

name: Plastic Bottle
description: A lightweight plastic bottle, ideal for carrying water or beverages.

name: Stainless Steel Bottle
description: A durable stainless steel bottle, perfect for keeping drinks hot or cold.

name: Aluminum Bottle
description: An eco-friendly aluminum bottle, great for outdoor activities.

name: Ceramic Bottle
description: A stylish ceramic bottle, suitable for both decoration and practical use.

name: Vacuum Insulated Bottle
description: A vacuum-insulated bottle, designed to maintain the temperature of your drinks for hours.

name: Sports Bottle
description: A specially designed sports bottle, featuring a convenient sipper for easy hydration during workouts.

name: Infuser Bottle
description: An infuser bottle, allowing you to add fruits or herbs to your water for infused flavors.
